TextView.android:text: Is there something you like to do but are limited in doing?
Do you have competing responsibilities that make it difficult for you to get to your appoinments or follow your healhtcare plans?
How do you feel about healthcare providers? How have your past experiences impacted this?
Do you have any spiritual or religious beliefs that influences your thoughts about your health?
How does your cultural background (for example, the branch you served in the military culture or your ethnic or racial background) impact the way you care for your health?
